verses.name: 1 Samuel 14:3
verses.text: And Ahiah, the son of Ahitub, I–chabod’s brother, the son of Phinehas, the son of Eli, the Lord’s priest in Shiloh, wearing an ephod. And the people knew not that Jonathan was gone.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 14:4
verses.text: And between the passages, by which Jonathan sought to go over unto the Philistines’ garrison, there was a sharp rock on the one side, and a sharp rock on the other side: and the name of the one was Bozez, and the name of the other Seneh.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 14:5
verses.text: The forefront of the one was situate northward over against Michmash, and the other southward over against Gibeah.
